CustomField.description: Budgeted forecasts will be used by Finance to build the corresponding time period's budget. Pilot forecasts are used for new unproven partners to test capabilities and determine true volumes and capacity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Budgeted forecasts will be used by Finance to build the corresponding time period's budget. Pilot forecasts are used for new unproven partners to test capabilities and determine true volumes and capacity.
CustomField.label: Forecast Type
